explains: adj. 用铅版印刷的；老一套的
v. 把……浇铸成铅版；使成为陈规（stereotype 的过去分词）

sentences.en: He was stereotyped by some as a renegade.
sentences.cn: 他被一些人带着成见视为一名叛逆者。

sentences.en: Why are professors stereotyped as absent-minded?
sentences.cn: 为什么在人们心目中教授就一定健忘呢？

sentences.en: Children from certain backgrounds tend to be stereotyped by their teachers.
sentences.cn: 教师往往模式化地根据学生的某些背景把他们归为某一类学生。
